scripts.start: set MOCK=true && set NODE_ENV=development && webpack --colors --progress && static tiles/marketplace/public/
scripts.deploy: set MOCK=false && set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --progress --colors && jive-sdk build add-on --apphosting="jive" && anrom-sdk upload-extension https://example.com -u dbogomolov
scripts.deploy-prod: set MOCK=false && set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --progress --colors && jive-sdk build add-on --apphosting="jive" && anrom-sdk upload-extension https://community.nintex.com -u dbogomolov
scripts.build: set MOCK=false && set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --progress --colors && jive-sdk build add-on --apphosting="jive"
